attributes.action: Boycott of 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned propose a boycott of all Russian Sporting events including the 2018 FIFA World Cup unless drastic action is taken against a racist and homophobic culture within Russian society.

This petition is a call to the British Government to bring pressure from the FA, Premier League and the PFA, to FIFA and UEFA over the reported racist chanting in the recent CSKA Moscow v Manchester City Champions League game.

We the undersigned demand that England and the other Home Nations withdraw from the 2018   FIFA World cup in Russia, and it’s qualifying process, unless the Russian Government and Football Federation join together to stop racist behaviour within football.
